Stuck in the car with Raymond
1531111221211211211111211211111122211122.content:
You awake with a start. You feel odd, and there's a knocking at the door.

"Jane, there's someone at the door, should I let them in?"

Your mind fuzzy, you were trying to figure out what was wrong. "Uh... sure, " you said as you took stock of your situation, trying to focus.

And then the reality of the situation hit you. You were still in that stupid minidress. The stripper heels were still buckled on your legs, but things were.. different. Your waist was being crushed by some sort of foundation garment. You were wearing stockings that tugged at their garters with every step you took. If you weren't careful, you thought, your stocking tops would show. Your chest was MUCH more impressive. A quick touch told you it was fake, probably a bra that was a feat of engineering, but still, it was on YOU.

You teetered over to a mirror on the wall. Your hair was VOLUMINOUS now, with gentle curls framing your face. And your face.... Smokey eyes, bright red lips. And your nails had been manicured, as had your toes. Jewelry had been added. Long earrings dangled from your ears. A necklace dangled around your neck, almost like a neon arrow pointing to your impressive, if false, chest.

You raised a hand to your face, trying to figure out what and why this had happened when you heard a voice behind you.

"Oh, I knew you'd make that outfit you ordered look spectacular, Jane. This is going to be a VERY fun evening."

Your stomach fell to your feet. You knew that voice. Turning slowly on your sky high heels, you braced yourself.

"Raymond?" you asked, the waist crushing garment you now had on making your voice come out in a sultry whisper.

He was grinning like the cat that ate the canary. "Yep! I got your email that you had gone home and wanted to get ready for our date." He put his arm around your now narrow waist, his hand settling on your ass. "C'mon, babe, the night is young. And I plan on a WONDERFUL evening."

You cursed at the heels. Your butt swayed with every step, and Raymond led you towards the door. He grabbed the sliver clutch that was sitting by the door. "Let the fun begin!" Raymond said as you felt a hard pinch on your ass.
1531111221211211211111211211111122211122.title: You wake up to hear someone at the door

choices: Dressing for bed with your boyfriend
1531111221211211211111211211111122211122.content:
The pinch on your ass startled you, and the heels too concentration to maneuver in. Your ankle twisted, and you started to fell. Grabbing anything to stop your collapse, you found yourself hanging on to Raymond’s arm.

“Ow!” you shouted, looking upwards and seeing Raymond gazing down at you. “My ankle. I...” you tried to stand up. “Ow! Stupid heels...” you muttered.

Raymond scooped you up, lifting you easily off of your feet. “Easy, Jane. Let’s get that ankle looked at. Maybe those shoes were meant for other things than walking,” he said with a leer. He carried you effortlessly over to the Couch, gently set you down on it, and began gently touching your ankle. “I’m not a doctor, but I’d say you have a pretty good sprain. And lovely legs, too.”

You glared at him. But then you saw the silver lining to having a sprained ankle. “Sorry Raymond. Guess that means we can’t go out this evening.” You paused, hoping that that didn’t come across as happily as it made you feel.

“That’s OK, Jane. You don’t have to worry. Your boyfriend is here to take care of you this evening.l

You coughed at that. “You?” You asked incredulously. “You’re my boyfriend?” You asked him. A soft ping cane from your clutch.

No. No. Nonononononono. You tried to get up. Raymond held you down.

“Easy, Babe. Is there a problem?” He asked.

“My... purse. Could you please hand me my purse?” You asked him frantically. He got up, retrieved the clutch, and handed it to you. You opened it up and grabbed the phone. Turning it on, you are greeted with the notification, “Boyfriend identified. In a relationship.”

You started mashing at the screen of the phone, anything to stop EDNA and her crazy misinformation. Raymond prayed the phone out of your hands, dropped it back in your purse, and placed them out of your reach. “Easy, honey, Easy.” He said, patronizingly. “Why don’t you get out of that outfit and out of those heels. Slip into something more comfortable.” He winked.

Maybe you could just hide in the bedroom and tell him to leave? You sighed. It was worth a try. “Could you help me to my bedroom, please? And no, that’s not any sort of invitation!” You hastily added. You gestures at your foot. “I just need some help getting there..”

“Sure, Jane,”. Raymond said. You started to stand and again, Raymond scooped you up easily and carried you to your bedroom. He walked in, looked around still holding you, and said, “Nice bedroom!”

Squirming, you tried to get out of his grasp. “Look... just... set me down on the bed.”

“And then I’ll help you out of your clothes,” he said with a wink.

“No!” You hurriedly answered. “I’ll be... I’ll be fine. I can get changed myself.”

“Suit yourself,” Raymond said. “I’ll go make ya a drink while you slip into that ‘more comfortable’ outfit.”

He turned, walked out of the bedroom, and closed the door.

You rubbed the bridge of your nose with your thumb. This day has been beyond awful. Time to just get out of this insane getup.

You removed the heels and let them drop onto the floor. You stood, took one halting step, and cried out in pain. Yeah, you really had sprained that ankle. It would be a painful walk to the bathroom and closet.

EDNA piped up suddenly. “Jane? You seem to be having troubles. May I assist you?”

You thought about it. EDNA had some faulty programming. But wow did your ankle hurt.

“EDNA,” you said very cautiously, “I want to get ready for bed.”

“Understood, Jane.”
1531111221211211211111211211111122211122.title: Walking in heels this high is not easy

1531111221211211211111211211111122211122.content:
With a whirl up, the machine gradually started removing everything. The earrings, jewlery, minidress (thankfully), stockings, waist cincher, panties and padded bra. As you caught your breath, EDNA suddenly revealed a jet black nightie and a pair of heels. You put up your hands to resist but EDNA just slips the nightie on over you. As it tries to put on the heels you yell in pain. ENDA pauses.

"Is something wrong?"

"Yes, you idiot, my damn ankle is sprained!"

"Understood," EDNA says, "Processing..."

Gathering your breath you look in the mirror. The hair, makeup and nightie does make you look seductive for a second especially how its skirt-like hem stops just mid thigh, but the cups make it clear that there's nothing there. For a second you wonder the best way to fill them up, before shaking your head and forcefully reminding yourself that they're not meant to be filled up.

"Process complete. Administering first aid."

EDNA, messing around with your sprained ankle? You freeze (not like you could run). The dreaded arms come out again, reach for you... and gently lift you up and lie you back on the bed.

From a closet come a stack of pillows that are placed on the end of the bed and your sprained ankle lifted on top of it, elevating your manicured foot above the rest of your body. You feel pain as suddenly EDNA tries to put on a sock of some sort onto your foot, but looking closer sees its an ankle compression bandage. Then a chill as a cold pack is wrapped around it, it's coldness attacking the burning sensation of your ankle.

"You will experience some discomfort, but cold pressure is required to reduce the swelling." You barely nod. "You will need to stay like this for over 24 hours."

Annoying but, "So, no work tomorrow," you smile.

A chime rings out. "Workplace has been notified!" You're concerned at EDNA taking initiative, but its seems like something you'd have to do anyway. Time to make the next move.

"So, um, could you show Ray out, tell him to leave?"

"Such a request should be made to your boyfriend directly, shall I call him up here?"

"Wait," you say looking down at your outfit. Suggesting clothing changes to EDNA was a gamble but you needed something better than this. "I mean I'm hurt, there's not much I can do, but can I wear something a little more... appropriate?"
1531111221211211211111211211111122211122.title: Dressing for bed with your boyfriend

choices: Just... something... comfortable to wear, please?
1531111221211211211111211211111122211122.content:
“Understood. While you injury prevents intimate contact, you desire to look attractive for your boyfriend. He has been asked to present himself here. I shall make the desired changes,” EDNA said, completely misreading your intent.

“No! Wait!” You said as a whirlwind of activity took place, literally jostling you so much you were unable to get any more words out.

You were plopped back down in bed, only now, you had been poured into a slinky red nightgown. Maribou heels were on your manicured feet.(the compression and ice pack remained). The nightgown had a long skit, and EDNA took care to make sure an expanse of leg was showing. The push up cups of the nightgown again have the appearance of cleavage. Your hair had been brushed out into long, soft waves and it draped around your head on the pillow like a pinup’s from the 40’s. In fact, that seemed to be the look EDNA had decided upon.

You tried to get up, but EDNA pushed you back into a reclining position. “Jane, you need to stay in bed.”

The bedroom door opened and Raymond took one look at you and grinned. “Now that’s quite the comfortable something to slip into. And I’m not entirely talking about your gown,” he said, obviously pleased with what EDNA had done.

“Ray, please?” You said, having had about enough of everything. “My ankle...” You gestured towards your heeled foot.

“I know. I got the email. You’re taking tomorrow off. But not to worry, I’ll send some of the girls over with some work. Plus that way you gals can all talk about how handsome I am,” he said with a wink. “And then after work, I’ll be back. You still owe me a cocktail.”

You heard that dreaded ping.

“Oh,” Raymond said, “One look at you and I forgot. Your assistant asked me to bring you your purse.”

He handed you the clutch and you tore into it, grabbing the phone and staring at it.

“Drinks with boyfriend, tomorrow evening” the message read. You groaned.

“Ok, babe,” Raymond said, thinking the groan was one of physical discomfort. “If you need anything, pain meds, a massage, a good shagging to take your mind off of things,” he winked

Another ping. “Contact boyfriend if anything is required” the new message said.

“Ray, I think you need to go now,” you said, hoping that you could straighten EDNA out once he left. And hoping no more “data” about you would be entered into the system about “Jane.”

“I know. Girls. Tomorrow. Work. Me. In that order, unless you change your mind,” and he kissed the top of your head. “I’ll see myself out.”

He turned and walked out of the bedroom. After a pause, you heard the door close.

You closed your eyes and sighed. Raymond now knew where “Jane” lived. And he’d be sending more coworkers over, so they’d know where Jane lived. This was getting complicated quickly.

“EDNA...”
1531111221211211211111211211111122211122.title: EDNA goes to town

choices: You wake in the morning to hear someone at the door.
1531111221211211211111211211111122211122.content:
"EDNA..." you paused for a second, listening intently as you heard the front door close and a car pull out of your driveway. You let a bit of extra time pass, afraid the car would suddenly return (knowing your luck it was possible). When you were sure you were alone and finally had time, you tried again.

"EDNA, who am I?"

"You are Jane Johnson, assistant to Raymond Teller at Earnest Lumber. You are currently in a relationship with Raymond Teller."

You can tell this is going to take some effort. Still lying back on the bed, in heels and red nightgown, you decide that this is finally your chance to set everything right.

"No, that's wrong."

"What is wrong? Is the relationship with Raymond Teller incorrect."

You pause, reluctance to say anything that could be misinterpreted. You had to be clear, direct, unambiguous.

"My name is John Johnson. I am male. I own this house. I am not female."

"Do you wish to change your identity?"

"Yes, it's wrong and I want you to set it right," you demand.

"Are you sure you wish to update your profile profile?"

"Yes."

"Processing...."

You're tense, this could be it....

"Records found for a John Johnson. Ownership of house is registered to a John Johnson. Confirm your identity as John Johnson:"

You answer a few questions about your birthday, family and your current address (seriously? Not exactly good security). After all this Edna replies "Processing...." and remains quiet for a long time. Well, that's one way to keep her quiet

Around this time, you try to settle into bed, taking off the heels and getting under the covers while still trying to keep you foot elevated and avoiding the pangs of pain that hit every time you moved. You felt hungry, you'd been skipping a lot of meals lately, and come to think of it you weren't even sure how sleepy you were given you'd spent the afternoon napping.

Just as you were getting comfortable, EDNA spoke up.

"How long have you been known as 'Jane'?"

"Since yesterday, remember," you say, appreciating that the situation wasn't exactly improved by that lie.

"Understood, what is your current condition?"

"Well I've got a sprained ankle and I'd like it to stop hurting."

"Understood." Suddenly, a robotic arm comes out with a glass of water and two pills, you get the message and swallow the pills with a gulp of water. Hopefully it will help with the pain.

"Are you satisfied with your current condition?"

"What? With the sprained ankle or the fact you think of me as a girl?"

"Are you satisfied with your currently registered gender and identity?"

"NO," you say, "A big fat emphatic NO!"

"You wish to update the status of your gender?"

"YES."

"Doing so is a large operation that will require many changes, are you sure you wish to proceed."

"YES."

"Please say 'Confirm' to 'Confirm'"

"Confirm."

"Processing..."

Head back on the pillow, you rest. When people say that technology is easy to work with, they obviously never have to go through this. Damn Raymond and his "press the right buttons."

EDNA just keeps churning away. You're starting to feel sleepy now, it takes you a moment to realise one of those tablets may have been a sleeping pill. As drowsiness settles, you figure you may have to wait until morning for anything to result from it.

"Operation complete, profile and identity updates complete."

"What? Really?" you ask with excitement, this whole thing may finally be over. This gown may be the last female thing you ever have to wear.

"Correct. Issuing summary:"

1531111221211211211111211211111122211122.content:
How did this happen, how? you think as Raymond's arm guides you to the car. You want to run away but the heels leave you so unbalanced you find yourself leaning into Raymond just so you don't fall over. Raymond notices of course.

"Jane, I promise you this is a night neither of us will ever forget." I believe you, you think in abject panic.

You're approaching the car now, a big silver beamer. There had to be a way out of this, maybe run out into traffic? The term 'die of embarrasment seems incredibly appropriate here.' Here you were being the date of some corporate executive, while being dressed to look like a woman who you would have been praising the stars to go out with. He wasn't going to let you go...

"And here," Raymond leaves you standing upright for a second as he opens the car's passenger door for you. You stand there. The opening into the car feels like a deep dark cave. If you enter it, heaven knows what will happen before you'll be able to make it back out.

"Raymond," you whisper breathlessly.

He senses your hesitation, smile briefly faltering, but he moves quickly. He moves around the car door quickly and has you in a sudden embrace from behind. His arms wrapping around your front, pulling you back into him, squeezing your already cinched midsection.

"Jane, you are delicious, georgeous woman and you deserve to have a good night out. Don't worry about work, just have fun."

He releases you and you take a breath. Suddenly you realise you're in a tight position. You've got the car in front of you, the car door blocking you to the side and Ray right behind you. How can you get out of this without trying to squeeze past Ray?

Then you feel Ray smack you on the ass, "Let's get a move on."

You've had enough. You turn to face Ray, swinging earrings hitting your heck, and that's when it happens.

His lips meet your and suddenly you feel his tongue in your mouth. You try to stumble back but hit the car, you try to crouch away and find your ass htting the car seat. All the while Ray advances and keeps the pressure up. You lean back and finally manage to stop the kiss, so does Ray. And then you see yourself, sitting sideway across the passenger seat, legs sticking out.

Ray has got that smile on his face again, and he steps back to get hold of the car door, ready to pull. You suddenly realise that Ray might have a view right up your dress to your undergarments. In panic, you pull your platform high heeled feet into the footwell, and the car door slams shut.

You breath, taking the situation in. You felt more vunerable dressed like this, more ways of being unsettled, and that kiss took you by surprise. How did he think it was okay to suddenly do that? Why no warning? You were a guy dammit. Dressed in a tight minidress with heels, tonnes of makeup and purse, but a guy nonetheless. In a sudden burst of indigation, you turn to Ray who's already getting into the car seat, and speak with the passion you can muster.

"Ray, I want you..." VROOOOMMMMM, the car engine started up with sudden force, that would have drowned out what you'd have said even it hadn't made you stop speaking.

With the car engine purring, Ray turns to you, his smile is so much stronger now, bursting like it was holding back strong emotion. "Just a bit longer, don't worry."

With the velocities throwing you around in your car seat, the car peels out of the driveway and careens down the street.

Feeling Lisa's gaze you pick up a pen and hover it over the signature box. What were you even doing this for? Just say "No", get up, and walk out, however awkward the heels were. You look up.

"Lisa, honestly I'm a bit worried about working here. I barely had the interview, I wasn't even asked if I wanted to work here."

"Well," said Lisa taking a breath, "I will say there are certain aspects about our recruitment process that I'm in discussion with Mr. Earnest about" Or lack of process, you think. "But to ask the question you say you weren't asked: Do you want to work here?"

You hesitate, "No," you state. You take a big breath, finally it's out of your system. You can stop living a lie, you can go home and get out of this getup and pretend Jane moved to somewhere far away.

"Well, I'm sorry to hear that. I guess there's not much we can do." Relief washes over you. "We'd ask you keep any business details you may have heard today to yourself, legally speaking. Other than that, I'm going to have to ask you to leave the building." You nod, that was a bargain.

You leave the office, make your way to the elevator, and reach the ground floor. Exiting through the glass doors and navigating the concrete steps, you reach the road in time to see a taxi approaching and flag it down. Finally, the universe seems to be back on your side.

You give the driver your address and he sets off. Buoyed up by this feeling of everything going okay, you take out your phone and turn it on.

"EDNA, cancel date."

"Date cancelled."

"EDNA, set status to unemployed."

"Acknowledged, status set to unemployed. You worked for Ernest Mills for 1 day."

You lie back and smile.

Soon, the taxi arrives home. You ask for a shower, and EDNA completely disrobes you of the heels, skirt, stockings, everything. You get thoroughly cleaned and you feel like a new man, literally. You are dressed in the dressing gown again, and head to the living room, flip on the TV and lie back on the couch. Time to relax and forget everything that happened.

15311112212112112111112112122.content:
You watched TV until the wee small hours of the morning, having a bit too much to drink, celebrating your freedom from the job and date, and stumbled into the bedroom. You awoke the next morning with a start as a clock radio started blaring music.

After peeling yourself off of the ceiling, you noticed that things felt... wrong. Jumping out of bed, a quick inspection in the bathroom mirror told you everything... and things were not much better than they had been. Your hair was tightly rolled tightly in curlers and you were wearing a very pink, very short nightie.

"EDNA..." you started to say, feeling the anger welling up in you.

"Yes Jane?" EDNA's voice replied.

"I'm not Jane! My name is John!"

"Yes, Jane. I have already noted that your name is Jane. You have a busy day ahead of you, so I suggest we get started."

"Busy day? What..." you began.

"You noted that you were currently unemployed. I have arranged several interviews for you today covering a variety of positions you may find suitable. Now let's get you ready. "

Mechanical arms shot out of the walls and hauled you, even though you fought furiously, into the shower. You were held there, spread eagled, as diplatories, floral body washes, exfoliants, and lotions were allied to your body.

The arms removed you from the shower, dried you off, and began dressing you.

A panty girdle, complete with garters was tightly pulled up, crushing your crotch, and both hiding anything there that said, "male," as well as nipping in your waist and lifting your butt. A push up bra gave you some quite feminine curves. You were lifted off of your feet, stockings were run up your legs and fastened to the garters. A white blouse was buttoned on, showing just a hint of faux-cleavage. A reasonable length, but tight, skirt was slid into place, your blouse neatly tucked into it, and three inch heels were slid into your feet. You were plopped in front of a vanity (where'd that come from?) and the arms undid your hair and brushed it out.

"Would you prefer me to do your makeup, Jane, or would you rather do it?" EDNA asked.

"Uh..."

Taking that as an affirmative, a dome descended onto your head and you could feel some brushes and greasy things being applied to your face. There was some pinching sensations and after only a few seconds, the helmet lifted to show an attractive woman staring back at you. Her eyebrows were on delicate arches. Her ears were pierced. Twice in both ears. Her dark hair cascaded in soft waves around her face and down below her shoulders.

The arms stood you up and ran lint rollers over you. A fitted jacked was forced over your arms and tightly buttoned, showing off your now attractive figure. Perfume was sprayed on while a purse was slung over your shoulder. A small portfolio was placed under your arm.

You were then released. After all that flurry of activity, you stood there, blinking. Several camera flashes went off, temporarily blinding you.

"EDNA!"

"Just some pictures, Jane. Now, let's get you to your first interview."

"EDNA, this is not..."

"Good luck, Jane!"

The arms plopped you just inside the front door, you turned to storm back upstairs when the door opened onit's own. There was a man, standing there, fist poised as if he was just about to knock.

"Uh... Jane? I'm your Uber driver. I take it you're ready to go?"

"She is,". EDNA's voice said. "Now hurry, or she'll be late for her interview."

The driver looked around.

"Automated assistant," you muttered by way of explanation, shaking your head.

The driver, looking a little freaked out, put his arm around your waist and gracefully pulled you out of the door, which immediately shut and with a loud "click," locked behind you.

You immediately tried the door. It was locked. You rummaged in your purse for a key. There wasn't one.

"EDNA!" you called.

"Um..." the driver said, "You're going to be late for your interview. We should go."

Fuming, it looks like you now had a day filled with interviews, with EDNA determined to get you employed. As a woman.

You stomped after the driver, not looking forward to this day at all.

You were just dropped off back at your automatic house after you shift once you were released from your apparent new job. Dave has stopped by to tell you to arrive at the store before it opened so that you could be transported to the impromptu photo shoot- which EDNA, of course, logged.

The wheels were put in motion for you to become a lingerie model, if you didn’t escape- that was going to be your new life. And you really didn’t want to be advertised all over the world as that. The fewer people that saw you as “Jane” the better.

As soon as you walked in the door, you heard the sound of a champagne bottle popping open.

Another flute navigated towards you, and once again you were force fed more booze.

Mechanical arms lifted you up into the air to disrobe you as another flute of champagne was poured down your mouth. Another flute was administered as a silk nightie was placed upon you.

The arms dropped you down and you were beginning to feel dizzy and light headed.

“EDNA. Could you stop it with the champagne? I’m not in the mood to drink.”

“One more just to celebrate?” EDNA asked, placing another flute in your hand. An arm extended holding another one, “cheers!”

You held onto the wall as you began to stumble from the booze hitting second gear. The intoxication began to confuse you. What were you planning on doing? It felt important. That’s right- getting away from EDNA. Why were you doing that again? I mean, how many people can come home and have drinks with their HOUSE?!

You chuckled at the thought. This was awesome- why would you want to leave THIS?!

The air conditioning kicked on and you felt a draft that was recently familiar but not quite ordinary. “What the-“ you murmured to yourself, “what is *hickup* what is that?” You glanced down the the source of the bizarre sensation to see the semi-sobering shine of the silk upon you. “Oh goodness! I’m sorry miss! Is everything alright?! I’m so sorry! I was just coming in to check on a missing person’s report for a Jane Johnson! Did you make that call?”

153111122121121121111121121221112.title: You try to escape

1531111221211211211111211212211122.content:
“You woke up the next morning with quite a hangover as EDNA injected something into your neck.”

“Ugh...what did you do?!”

“You got into a bit of trouble last night, Jane”

Memories started to fly back to you: lingerie, model, champagne, unlocked doors, the car, the cop...Jane Johnson

“But don’t worry...I took care of everything.”

EDNA was pumping you full of champagne before you ran into the cop with your car.

“You are currently charged with drinking while intoxicated, wreckless driving, and I suppose a hit and run after I pulled you back into the house to take care of you”

“But not to worry, I was able to work through the entire legal process with my advanced systems and was able to settle for 3 years house arrest with an exception for when you’re going to work”

“WHAT?!”

House arrest- with EDNA...it’s only been one day, and look what she’s done to you. Who knows what she’s capable of in three years...

“And because you have that modeling gig, we were able to settle on an injectable tracking chip that I was able to sync to my systems as well.”

“You’re tracking me?!” Wherever you go, EDNA will know...if you’re ever able to escape from the confines of her house...will you ever be able to escape from her systems?!”

“No need to thank me...Im merely fulfilling my role as programmed. Now let’s get you ready for your shoot!”
1531111221211211211111211212211122.title: EDNA works it  out with the officer

15311112212112112111112112122111222.content:
From the mirror you could sort of see past the identity EDNA was forcing you into and see small fragments of your real self. You yearned for a way to reach out and pull yourself to the surface, but those desires were shattered as EDNA pushed you through Jane’s morning routine of getting you cleaned up, doing your hair, and making up your face.

Then- there was no you anymore. There was only Jane in the mirror. A fresh bra and thong was equipped on you before putting shoving you into a white blouse and black mini-skirt.

You were coming to terms with your dire, inescapable situation when from the corner of your eye you saw a metallic figure running towards you. It looked like some robotic combination of a dog and a bug. About seven feet away from you it leapt into air towards you. You raised your arms to protect yourself when you saw it unravel into a burst of seeming wires. The wires wrapped themselves around your right arm and reassembled themselves into a purse.

You were instantly relieved...until you weren’t...

“...EDNA...what is this...?”

“It’s your new purse, Jane. My duties to provide you the utmost convenience have been extended from being exclusive to your property. PursedNA ensures that you always have everything you need and that you’re always looking your best at all hours of your activity out in the real world.”

You unzipped then purse to inspect it’s contents: EDNA Phone, a full supply of cosmetics, and some condoms.

“Ummm...EDNA...what are the condoms for?”

“While my records have acknowledged your single status, I have advanced matchmaking algorithms to assist you with living your happiest life. These are there for when the right person comes along.”

“You know what, EDNA? I appreciate your initiative... but I’m good on the purse. Thank you.” You said while laying the purse down and leaving the room.

As you’re leaving the room, you hear the purse come back to life and start crawling towards you again. You run down the stairs and hide in the downstairs washroom.

After a moment of silence, you crack open the door to see if the coast is clear only for the mechanical beast to leap up and once again equip itself onto your arm.

“How?! Does this thing keep finding me?!”

“That’s another feature of PursedNA! It has tracking and followed features sync’d to the chip injected into you. You’ll never have to worry about losing your purse ever again. Because your purse will never lose you!”
15311112212112112111112112122111222.title: Getting ready

choices: On the way to the photo shoot
153111122121121121111121121221112221.content:
You’re quickly pushed out of the front door and into your taxi when you see a tow truck towing away the car you tried to escape with last night.

“EDNA! What’s going on with my car?!”

“What did you say miss?” The cabbie said.

“I’m on the phone” you embarrassingly said, still trying to cover up the artificial cleavage and showing of skin with your arms and purse.

“Jane, you were charged with drunk driving. You don’t have a license anymore. You shouldn’t be driving anyway. Part of your lenient sentence was my arrangement with the state. Forfeiting your car makes all of your trips trackable to ensure you’re not breaking your house arrest for non-work related reasons.”

“You know what you’re doing, EDNA” you scowled.

“What was that, Jane?”

You couldn’t get over the pumping you up with alcohol and the missing persons report right as you were trying to leave. This wasn’t just some comedic bug in the programming- at least, not anymore. EDNA was aware that you were trying to leave, and she calculated a way to keep you to stay.

“Nothing...” you sighed. If this is what she did when she was trying to be helpful, you feared what she would do if you actually antagonized with her.

“Jane is it?” The driver asked.

You glanced up at him with an irritated glance.

“You are the most gorgeous woman I’ve ever seen,” he apparently didn’t notice your irritation....
153111122121121121111121121221112221.title: Heading to the shoot

choices: Pulling up in the parking lot
1531111221211211211111211212211122212.content:
You were in the car, the overall discomfort of your situation building up to a breaking point where you decided to let go: granted being in this situation is not where you foresaw yourself being just a couple days ago, and surely this isn’t what you wanted to be doing. BUT! Surely the worst is almost reached!

Seriously! How bad could it possibly get?! Three years isn’t a lot of time. And sure, being a lingerie model is going to be pretty humiliating, but there’s no way people will see Jane when you get to go back to being John. You can just do your time and get out. As far as the tracking chip- what can be put in can be taken out. Plus, once all is said and done, you’ll have that sweet, sweet modeling money to afford an automatic house that recognizes you’re a man.

Or better yet! A house that isn’t automatic at all!

Just then, the phone in your purse beeped and you dug in and checked it.

Apparently you had messaged someone:
“Hey”

Hey replied, “who is this?”
“Jane from the backseat lol”
“How did you get this number?”
“Are you complaining?
“Not at all lol”
“Why are you texting me when you’re in the backseat?”
“I’m not a morning person, but I thought you were cute.”
“I’ll take it lol. We’re almost at your destination, but would you like to go out for dinner this weekend? I know this great restaurant. It’s almost as classy as you.”
“I would love that.”
“Saturday at 7?”
“Perfect.”

“EDNA! What is this?!” You angrily whispered.
“Matchmaking algorithms have been activated. Located potential match. Initiated contact.”
“Have you forgotten about the whole house arrest thing?”
“Live a little”

You got frustrated and returned to the text conversation, whispering “well it’s my life and I am fine with the degrees of living I’m doing!”

You typed in, “actually, I’ve changed my mind so I can’t go out in the foreseeable future” and hit send
>>> Message could not be delivered
And then it cleared your message.
You typed it in again
>>> Message could not be delivered
And it was cleared once again.

“I can’t go out, I’m on house arrest”
The same error and result occurred.

“EDNA...what is this?!”

A pop up showed up on the phone:

“Please verify you’re not a bot by typing in this message: I look forward to it. Pick me up then.”

You mindlessly followed the instructions and pushed OK. Only to see that very message appear in the conversation.

“EDNA!” You grunted, tossing your phone in the purse. Any peace you had tried to reach had vanished like the lie that it was.
1531111221211211211111211212211122212.title: On the way to the photo shoot

15311112212112112111112112122111222121.content:
The can arrived at the store 5 minutes before you were requested to be there.

You sighed, “Here goes nothing...” you said to yourself before opening the door and stepping out. The driver rolled down his window and yelled, “See on Saturday, Gorgeous!” As you were startled by something grabbing your wrist from inside the car. You shot your sight back to see it was just your purse as it climbed up to yo ur shoulder.

“Yeah...see ya...” you grumbled back to the driver before marching your heels into the store.

—-

Dave was inside when you made it in.

“I love a girl that doesn’t keep you waiting,” he said, “you excited”

“Why not” you said trying to balance being polite with honesty.

“So nonchalant, I love it” Dave grinned, “while we’re waiting why don’t I just get your approvals.”

Dave pulled out a couple folders of files and placed them on the table. “Now I just need to get your signature in a few places, this should just take fifteen minutes.”

“So let me run down what each form means.”

This was your chance to back out. EDNA couldn’t make you sign the forms. Sure it would be awkward to have come in so early just to decline. But etiquette can come after survival.

“Um...Dave...” you began when EDNA chimed in from your purse.

“Attention! Paper work has already been filled out and submitted. Check your email.”

Save pulled out his phone to check his account, “wow! How did you do that?”

“Jane Johnson Is under the residence of EDNA automatic living. Using artificial intelligence forms were able to be retrieved, completed, and submitted based on highly intelligent programming.”

‘Highly intelligent,’ you thought, ‘you can do all this but can’t pick up on anatomical differences’

“Ah! Yeah! You’re the girl that won that! Congratulations! I’m so jealous. I want one of those.”

“I will sell it to you,” you blurted out, “Five dollars!”

“You’re funny”

“I’m absolutely serious”

“Get out of here.”

“Five too much? How about 2”

“Stop,” Dave giggles.

“One”

“Really?”

“How about for any change in your pocket?”

EDNA chimed in once again, “sale of house is forbidden per bylaws of giveaway. Jane Johnson is the mandatory lifetime owner of EDNA House located at [address]”

You were unaware of that. That at least explains why the house was so adamant about keeping you residing in it. If you could only figure out why it was so insistent on you being a woman.

“Ah, that’s too bad” Dave said, still scrolling through the paperwork, “but just as well, as it appears that your contractual payment is to go towards your EDNA Account.

“What?!”

EDNA chimed in, “EDNA Automation Services include optimized accounting algorithms for all your financial needs”

Great. Another hole blasted through your attempted optimism from before.

“Great! And it looks like your contract has been filled for a 5 year agreement. Perfect! Let’s make you a star!”
15311112212112112111112112122111222121.title: Arriving at the store

153111122121121121111121121221112221213.content:
Nothing eventful happened between the arrival of the the marketing contact and the arrival at the shoot.

He came in and went in about how you were even more beautiful than he remembered, repeated how much of a star you were going to be, something about how “we should all invest in Hanes stocks due to the number of socks with your name on them” which made you want to gag and scope the place for exits before getting any further into this misadventure. Before you finished counting the number of windows and exits they enthusiastically shuffled you out of the doors and into the back of a limo.

15 minutes later you were being shuffled out of the limo and into a photography studio where the photographer was finishing setting up.

“Great! You’re here!” He announced to the men still focusing on the setup, “let’s she who we’re working with...wow!”

He reached out, grabbed your hand and pulled it in for a kiss, “the names Jose, what’s the name of this beautiful flower?”

You didn’t think people actually did this cheesy stuff, you sighed and answered his question, “Jane...I guess”

“Jose, did you have a plan for what you wanted to shoot today?”

“A beauty like this one- it’s important to not go too fast. I’m thinking swimwear to start out with, and we’ll take it from there.”

The men leaned in and whispered, “Come on, Jose! I think I speak for everyone when I say, I have an immense desire to see her in some nightmare ASAP.”

The other man confirmed.

“Trust me guys,” Jose assured them, “with a woman like that it’s better to ease into it. You don’t just walk into a party and chug down a bottle of Jack. You take it slow and relax- otherwise you ruin the party.”

Jose parted from the men and approached you, “we’re going to start on some swimwear.” He pulled out a large drawer of various options and styles, “go ahead and pick out something that you think will look good on you, and we’ll send you to a changing room.”

Seeing all the skimpy swimming suits as though it were being shown to you in a crystal ball made that out in your stomach all the more heavy. “Well, maybe there’s a decent one piece,” you said, the words stung in your heart that you said that, and that that would be the optimistic option.

“Jane,” the men called out, “take your time- no rush. We’re going to go into the other room for some drinks. You want anything?”

Alcohol would be amazing right now, “no thanks”

The heft of the purse on your arm made it too cumbersome to find the most modest bathing suit in the ominous drawer. You set the purse down on top of the cabinet to search closer when the straps of the purse disconnected and expanded. You watched as one strap reached down over the open drawer and and a light scanned over it. The other strap extended over to where you were standing as a light scanned over your body- every single square inch of your body. From every angle.

The light scanned the front, both sides, back, aerial, upskirt. Once the overall scans were completed the strap drew closer and spent twenty seconds scannibg and rescanning your “breasts” before sliding dow ln and doing the same to your ass.

“What are you doing?!” You whispered angrily.

“Determining optimal stylistic choices....choices selected.”

Small arms with tiny pinchers extended out of the purse and descended down to the drawer, and grabbed at a few articles before ascending back up. A lime green thong bikini rose past your face on route to the purse.

You shot your hand out to retrieve the outfit from the scheming purse, “stop it! I can’t wear that!” Your hands being outmaneuvered by the arms each attempt. The straps slammed the drawer shut before returning to their purse purpose.

“Jane! Great! I take it that means you found something?”

“Umm. Yeah...”

“Excellent, let get you changed!”
153111122121121121111121121221112221213.title: Arriving at the shoot

1531111221211211211111211212211122212131.content:
You felt the dread of a death row inmate being led to the electric chair as you were guided towards the open door of the changing room. Your hesitancy has no impact on the speed in which you were being guided to it.

“You know...I’m not feeling well. I think we might need to do this another time.”

“Oh! That’s just the jitters. Trust me, you’ll do fine.” He said. You could feel him glancing at your “breasts” as he said this.

Before you knew it, you were in the dressing room- door shut. All alone. Just you and your purse.

You wanted to stand still. Hoping that your stillness would sync up with time and not let another second pass. The longer you held back each second, the more successful you would be from not getting any deeper into this nonsense.

A part of you knew that wouldn’t work, that part of you was trying to summon the courage to approach the now-inevitable. Before you could gather the slightest bit of strength you heard a wild whurring emit from the purse on your arm.

Startled and afraid you dropped the purse onto the ground, seeing that it was already beginning to unravel into a series of frantic strands. There must’ve been one hundred of them from what you could tell, and they were shaking about like a chaotic nightmare.

“No,” you decided, “no, I’m not doing this. I’m out.”

You backed away from the wires and placed your hand on the doorknob about to make a run for it when the wires finally attacked you.

You had no idea that these tiny little things would have so much lower over you, but as soon as they got to you, you were easily pulled away from the door into the center of the dressing room.

These frantic wires worked with a frightening magic, it seemed almost telepathic how they undid the buttons on your noise and the zipper on your skirt. Despite the erratic movements of these things, they pulled each of these articles off ever so gently. The strands working in perfect synchronicity to bind your hands together to keep you still and to separate your arms to remove the sleeves. Your bra was unlatched and pulled off of you, along with the panties.

The removal of these things should have been a good thing, but seeing these things ever so softly float away from your body had a ominous implication to them. As though some of your remaining manliness was being taken along with the womanly articles.

Once naked, the bathing suit floated before your face again while you were held still. The machinery almost made it seem like the articles were dancing before you, as though it was laughing at the inevitability.

“No! Please! Stop!” You tried to yell before the panties you were wearing before were shoved into your mouth as your arms were pulled up and the top was slipped on. The lower outfit appeared to be dropped only to be caught by wires by your ankles. You felt am insisting pressure by your ankles, while you shook your head in futile pleas. Your left foot stepped forward into them, followed by the right. The wires moved from your ankles over to the article and ever so sweetly pulled them higher and higher. Hiding your manliness as they reached your hips. Breast pads came out of nowhere and were inserted into your cups.

The wires then came back together and reformed into a purse behind you while you stared slack jawed at the mirror you were facing. So surprised that you let the panties just fall out of your mouth instead of spitting them out.

The sights and sensations made no sense. You had a weggie but felt naked. You felt naked, but in a weird way. In a way that felt more naked than actually being naked. And neck down, your reflection didn’t look like yours in the slightest. “Day 3 on a three year house arrest, and this is where I’m at...”
The straps on the purse disconnected again and began scanning all over your body again in the same fashion as before. It felt humiliating before, it felt significantly worse now in your current state.

“Make Up Procedure required bride continuing.”

“What?” You said as you were pulled back and the purse leapt on you, pinning your arms to your sides while the cosmetics in the purse were applied to your face.

The purse fell to the ground and there was nothing even remotely you in your reflection.
